content:
As Deltor, you take a moment before the raid to call the runner girl you met at the bar. You explain the situation to her and ask if she has any information on Johann Bauer that could help with the raid. She tells you that she's heard that Bauer is paranoid and always carries a small black book with him, it could contain important information.

You thank her for the information and hang up, relaying the information to Detective Petrov and the team. The team adjusts the plan accordingly, with a priority on capturing the black book. With this new information, the team is more focused and determined to succeed in their mission.

You and the team head out, ready to bring Bauer and his associates to justice and put an end to the crime wave. You're aware that this could be a dangerous operation and that there are always uncertainties, but you are confident in your team's abilities and training.
